document_data.name: Bloodguzzler Garb
document_data.mainbody: The '''''bloodguzzler garb''''' was a set of clothing that bolstered the combat prowess of the wearer, the more injured they became in battle.
document_data.Description: The clothes absorbed any blood that came into contact with its surface.
document_data.Powers: Whenever the wearer of the bloodguzzler garb became severely wounded in battle, their body produced adrenaline. As a result they became more adept at inflicting more grievous wounds in battle.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the garb remained in the belly of a rogue [[bulette]] that roamed around [[Ebonlake Grotto]].
